description.raw: Currently exported functions (which start with the name BASH_FUNC) since the shellshock patch do not export correctly to some DRM systems. Since the goal is to have segway to work on as many clusters as possible I believe we can safely filter out any bash functions (BASH_FUNC) from our exported environment. We'll maintain any loaded environment settings but not any functions. This way we'll also avoid any users locally defined functions from potentially causing errors in the future.
